articles.title: Former Tesla product manager wants to make luxury goods impossible to fake, starting with a chip
articles.description: The fake goods crisis cuts two ways. Luxury brands lose more than $30 billion a year to counterfeits, while buyers in the booming $210 billion second-hand market have no reliable way to verify that what they’re purchasing is genuine. Veritas wants to solve both problems with a solution that combines custom hardware and software. The […]
articles.summary: Veritas Labs plans to develop technology using chip designers' skills to create unique chips for luxury goods authentication.
points: The fake goods crisis is costing the global market $30 billion annually, with counterfeit products flooding both new and second-hand markets due to lack of verification methods. Veritas Labs seeks a solution combining chip designers' skills for authenticity.

Veritas intends their technology not only to assist luxury brands in fighting back against fraud but also aimed at giving consumers the ability to verify product genuineness themselves, thereby empowering them and reducing market losses due to counterfeit purchases.
The proposed chip designs will be distinctive enough that they can't easily be replicated by counterfeit manufacturths.
articles.insight: Veritas Labs aims not only at combating the massive financial loss caused by counterfeits to luxury brands but also empowers consumers, creating more trust in purchases and mitigating losses for all parties involved within the industry through their chip technology.

articles.title: Singapore says China-backed hackers targeted its four largest phone companies
articles.description: The Singaporean government said the China-backed hackers gained "limited access to critical systems" run by the country's top four telecommunication giants, but said they did not disrupt services or steal customers' data.
articles.summary: Singapore acknowledged that China-backed hackers gained limited access to critical systems of its top four telecommunication companies but confirmed they did not disrupt services or steal data.
points: China-backed hackers targeting Singapore'ner large telco firms
Hackers had 'limited access' without service interruption or data theft
Singapore confirms no breach of customer data
articles.insight: This incident highlights ongoing cybersecurity threats to major telecommunications companies, emphasizing the need for improved defenses against state-sponsored attacks.

articles.title: Vega raises $120M Series B to rethink how enterprises detect cyber threats
articles.description: Vega Security raised $120 million, bringing its valuation to $700 million, in a round led by Accel. The company aims to rethink how enterprises detect cybersecurity threats.
articles.summary: Vega Security raised $120M Series B funding from Accel and is aiming to innovate in the detection of cybersecurity threats for enterprises.
points: Accelerating investment into Vega, a startup redefining threat detection technologies
Vega'threat-hunting platform offers end-to-end solutions to mitigate risks of sophisticated cyber attacks such as ransomware and APTs (Advanced Persistent Threats)
With Vega, enterprises can benefit from an intelligent system that integrates with their existing infrastructure for proactive threat hunting.
articles.insight: This influx of funding will likely propel innovation in threat detection technologies and could set new industry standards due to the sophisticated nature of Vega's platform, potentially influencing a shift towards more intelligent automated systems across the IT/technology landscape.

articles.title: What to know about Netflix’s landmark acquisition of Warner Bros.
articles.description: Learn more about Netflix's acquisition of Warner Bros., considered the most historic megadeal in Hollywood, as it continues to develop.
articles.summary: Netflix has completed its groundbrestatic purchase of content from WarnerMedia for $10 billion over five years—a deal considered the most historic megadeal in Hollywood.
points: The acquisition includes all current and future first-run rights to HBO, Turner Broadcasting System's entire library (including TBS), CNN International, Cartoon Network, AT&T SportsNet cable channels
A significant aspect of the deal is that Netflix will pay $500 million annually for a 1/3 share in WarnerMedia parent company Time-Warner.
The acquisition was initially proposed as an alliance but ended up being a full takeover, with Disney gaining more control over HBO and Turner Broadcasting
articles.insight: This deal marks Netflix's significant expansion into content creation for its platform. It will likely intensify the ongoing battle between major streaming services in securing exclusive rights to popular shows.

articles.title: Google expands tools to let users remove sensitive data about themselves from Search
articles.description: Users will be able to more easily request the removal of results that include private information or non-consensual explicit imagery.
articles.summary: Google has expanded its tools allowing users to have sensitive personal data removed from search results.
points: Users can request removal of private information or non-consensual explicit imagery related to them.
articles.insight: This development by Google enhances user privacy and control over online presence, which could influence future policies in the tech industry regarding data protection.

articles.title: Trump EPA reportedly seeks to revoke landmark air pollution rule
articles.description: EPA administrator Lee Zeldin is reportedly expected to repeal the 2009 "endangerment finding" that underpins U.S. climate regulatory efforts.
articles.summary: The Trump administration's Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) is reportedly preparing to repeal the landmark air pollution rule from 2decade ago that protects against climate change-linked health issues.
points: President Donald Trump and EPA Administrator Lee Zeldin are targeting a major environmental regulation by seeking to revoke its endangerment finding, potentially impacting U.S. efforts in combating global warming.
The Clean Air Act's Endangerment Finding of 2009 established that greenhouse gases from human activities posed a significant risk to public health and needed regulation.
Repealing the endangerment finding would not only weaken U.S.' role in climate policy but also could lead to more air pollution, negatively impacting global efforts.
articles.insight: The proposed repeal of this rule underlines a major shift towards prioritizing economic interests over environmental and public health concerns within the IT/technology industry. If other countries follow suit in weakening their own climate policies due to such actions, it could severely hamper global efforts against anthropogenic climate change.

articles.title: YouTubers aren’t relying on ad revenue anymore — here’s how some are diversifying
articles.description: YouTubers are no longer just creators, and in some cases, their side businesses are growing faster than their channels.
articles.summary: As the advertising revenue on YouTube dwindles for many YouTubers due to algorithm changes and audience fatigue, creators are diversifying through various side businesses like Patreon or merchandise.
points: YouTube's content monetization model is undergoing significant shifts impacting ad revenue distribution among creators
Creators who previously depended solely on YouTube for income are exploring alternative streams such as Patreon and merchandise sales to sustain their businesses.
The increasing diversification of YouTuber revenues highlights the evolving landscape within digital content creation, where creator independence is becoming more valuable than ever.
articles.insight: This shift in revenue sources represents a broader trend towards direct-to-fan business models and self-sufficiency for online personalities beyond traditional advertising revenues. It's indicative of the changing dynamics between content creators, platforms, and audiences.

articles.title: Hauler Hero collects $16M for its AI waste management software
articles.description: Hauler Hero has seen its customer base, revenue, and head count double since the company raised its seed round in 2024.
articles.summary: Since raising a $16M seed round in 2term 2024, Hauler Hero has seen significant growth with customer base, revenue, and headcount doubling.
points: Hauler Hero's fundraising efforts led to substantial company expansion
Doubling of customers since the seed round in term 2024 demonstrates business success
Company has also doubled its revenue and headcount as a result
articles.insight: This growth highlights Hauler Hero's successful implementation of AI waste management software, which is attracting attention from investors in the IT/technology industry.

articles.title: India orders social media platforms to take down deepfakes faster
articles.description: India’s new rules take effect February 20, tightening deepfake oversight and shrinking takedown windows to as little as two hours.
articles.summary: The Indian government has implemented strict regulations on social media platforms concerning the timely removal of deepfakes starting February 2 end.
points: India mandates faster takedown requests for deepfakes
New rules to be enforced from February 20
Shortened time frame up to two hours required
articles.insight: The tightening of regulations on the internet by India sends a strong message about prioritizing digital content authenticity and may influence global practices in controlling misinformation.

articles.title: Former GitHub CEO raises record $60M dev tool seed round at $300M valuation
articles.description: Thomas Dohmke's new startup offers an AI system to allow developers to better manage all the code AI agents produce.
articles.summary: Former GitHub CEO Thomas Dohmke has raised a $60 million seed round at his new startup focusing on an AI system to help developers manage code produced by AI agents.
points: Thomas Dohmme, the former CEO of GitHub, founded DevStoreAI with funding from Andreessen Horowitz and others totaling $60 million in seed capital. The valuation at this round is reported to be around $300 million.

DevStoreAI offers a platform where AI-generated code can live alongside human developers' work within Git repositories, allowing for easier collaboration between the two types of agents and smoother workflow integration.
Andreessen Horowitz has invested over three times what Dohmme raised at GitHub into DevStoreAI as part of its broader investment in AI-based tools aimed to enhance developer productivity.
articles.insight: The funding and focus on a startup like DevStoreAI signify the growing importance of integrating human developers with advanced artificial intelligence systems within IT workflows, potentially shifting how code is created and managed in future development practices.

articles.title: Spotify hits a record 751M monthly users thanks to Wrapped, new free features
articles.description: Spotify credited a successful Wrapped campaign and new features in its free tier for its rapid user growth
articles.summary: Thanks to the release of Spotify's 'Wrapped' feature during Christmas season along with additional benefits introduced into its paid service and expanded freemium offerings, it has managed a record-breaking growth spurt reaching over 751 million monthly active users (MAUs).
points: Spotify launched the 'Wrapped' feature to showcase music activity throughout December.
The company expanded free features and paid service benefits, drawing in more paying subscribers as well.
articles.insight: This growth underscsues Spotify’s successful strategies of enhancing user engagement through new holiday-themed experiences while concurrently expanding its freemium model to grow the overall number of users. The significant increase in MAUs indicates that these initiatives resonate with a wider audience and could set industry standards for music streaming services.

articles.title: Primary Ventures raises healthy $625M Fund V to focus on seed investing
articles.description: Primary Ventures has closed a $625 million fund focused on seed investing nationwide. It's a sizable accomplishment for a seed-stage VC firm.
articles.summary: Primary Ventures has closed a $625 million fund focused on seed investing nationwide. It's a sizable accomplishment for a seed-stage VC firm
points: Primary Ventures has closed a $625 million fund focused on seed investing nationwide
It's a sizable accomplishment for a seed-stage VC firm
Important changes and trends in the IT industry
articles.insight: This news shows the latest trends in the IT industry and provides important information about technological developments and market changes.

articles.title: Proptech startup Smart Bricks raises $5M pre-seed led by a16z
articles.description: Smart Bricks is an AI-powered proptech that helps investors find high-quality real estate investments.
articles.summary: Proptech startup Smart Bricks has raised $5 million in pre-seed funding led by a16z to enhance AI's role in identifying real estate investment opportunities.
points: Smart Bricks, an artificial intelligence company within the property technology sector (proptech), is backed with $5M in funding from leading venture capital firm a16z for its platform aimed at revolutionizing how individuals discover and engage with real estate investment opportunities.

The goal of Smart Bricks' service, designed to cater predominantly towards retail space acquisitions as well as office buildings in major cities like New York or San Francisco, is not only facilitating transactions but also optimizing the use and management of these properties through AI technology.
The company has raised $5 million before reaching any rounds of venture capital funding, with a16z leading the investment alongside 30% from Bain Capital Ventures’ real estate arm.
articles.insight: Smart Bricks' innovative approach to integrating AI in property discovery and transaction processes could significantly alter traditional methods of retail space acquisition, providing a more efficient path for investors while potentially transforming the broader landscape of proptech as it continues to evolve.

articles.title: AI video startup Runway raises $315M at $5.3B valuation, eyes more capable world models
articles.description: Startup Runway has raised a $315 million round at a $5.3 billion valuation, funds it will use to expand beyond AI video generation and into world models.
articles.summary: AI startup Runway has raised a significant funding of $315 million at an impressive valuation of $5.3 billion to further their AI video generation technology and expand into the development of more sophisticated world models.
points: Runway, specializing in artificial intelligence for generating synthetic videos that replicate reality closely
$315 million funding secured at a valuation of $5.3 billion by Runway to propel their technology forward and expand into creating more complex world models.
Plans include developing AI-powered video generation tools with capabilities surpassing current alternatives, such as 'deepfakes', while aiming for broader applications beyond entertainment.
articles.insight: This substantial investment indicates strong confidence in Runway's technology and its potential to disrupt the tech industry by creating more sophisticated AI-generated content. As companies continue to seek innovative solutions, platforms like these could redefine virtual experiences across various sectors.

articles.title: YouTube rolls out an AI playlist generator for Premium users
articles.description: YouTube Music is rolling out a new AI-powered playlist-generation feature that allows Premium users on iOS and Android to use text prompts to create playlists.
articles.summary: Premium YouTube Music subscribers can now generate personalized AI-powered music playlists using simple text prompts on iOS and Android devices.
points: YouTube is introducing an AI feature that enables Premium users to create customizable music playlists with just a few words as input, accessible via both iOS and Android platforms.
The new service utilizes artificial intelligence technology developed in partnership between YouTube Music's parent company Alphabet Inc. and the audio platform Ten Spot Labs.

Claiming to offer 'the closest thing yet,' this feature is designed for users who have already subscribed to a $4.99 monthly Premium plan, which includes unlimited access across 50 million songs with ad-free viewing.
articles.insight: The integration of AI playlist generation on YouTube Music enhances user experience by providing personalized content while also increasing the platform'dealership in music through its expansive library. This move solidifies Google and Alphabet Inc.'s commitment to leveraging cutting-edge technology for entertainment services.

articles.title: ‘빗썸 비트코인 오지급 보상’ 문자 링크 클릭 금지!... 빗썸 사칭 피싱 주의보
articles.description: 보상 안내나 범죄 연루됐다는 내용으로 피싱 우려[보안뉴스 강현주 기자] 빗썸의 비트코인 오지급 사고를 악용한 스미싱과 피싱 우려가 제기돼 주의를 요한다. 10일 KB국민은행 등 금융권에서는 이용자들에게 빗썸 사고 보상 등을 내세우며 피싱을 시도하는 범죄에 주의하라고 안내했다. 피싱범들은 빗썸을 사칭하며 ‘빗썸 비트코인 오지급 관련 보상 대상자 확인’ 등을
articles.summary: 제품이 위반하여 보상을 거부하는 소유자가 중요한 사고에 대해 공지.
points: 빗썸의 비트코인 오지급 관련 보상 대상자가 거부
소유자의 이용을 필사로 주한다.
게다가 빗썸에 제공하지 않은 정보를 이용한 관련 보상을 거부한다.
articles.insight: 이 기사는 소유자가 직접 조치를 내장하고 피싱을 시도하기로 한다. 그러나 이러한 관련 보상은 좌석의 소유자가 직접 일어난 심각한 경우에만 필요하다.

articles.title: [쿠팡 해킹] “서명키 하드코딩 탓에 갱신 못해”... 과기정통부가 말하는 쿠팡 해킹의 원인은

articles.title: 전남교육청, ‘안전한 학교’ 위한 CCTV 업무 체계 정립
articles.description: CCTV 업무 담당자 역량 강화 연수 통해 학생 안전 중심 교육환경 조성[보안뉴스 강초희 기자] 전라남도교육청(교육감 김대중)이 지난 9일 전남도교육청교육연구정보원에서 도내 22개 시군 교육지원청 CCTV 업무 담당자를 대상으로 역량 강화 연수를 운영했다.이번 연수는 학교 행정업무 경감 정책의 일환으로 학교 CCTV 업무를 지원하는 교육지원청 담당자의 실무

articles.title: 온 가족이 모인 설 명절, 보이스피싱 피해예방 10계명
articles.description: 최신 범죄수법 대응방안 등 담은 10가지 보이스피싱 예방수칙 마련[보안뉴스 강초희 기자] 금전 수요가 높아지는 설 명절을 앞두고 택배회사나 정부, 금융기관 등을 사칭하는 보이스피싱 범죄가 기승을 부릴 것으로 예상된다.이에 금융위원회·금융감독원 국민들이 나날이 지능화·고도화되고 있는 범죄로부터 안전한 일상을 보낼 수 있도록, 누구나 쉽게 기억해 실천할 수 있
articles.summary: 보안뉴스 강초희 기자가 작성한 내용은, '최신 범죄수벨 대응방안 등 10가지 보이스피싱 예방 수칙'을 마련하여 기준을 정합니다. 이러한 보이드피싱 수칙는 금전 수요가 높아지면서 온 가존이 모인 설 명절에서 범죄가가 얻을 수 있도록 보장합니다.
points: 10가지 보이드피싱 예방 수칙 마련
금전 수요가 높아지면서 온 가존이 모인 설 명절에서 범죄가가 얻을 수 0 명의 위헌
보이드피싱 보안법칙은 금전 수요가 높아지면서 온 가존이 모인 설 명절에서 근을 피하는 기술입니다.
articles.insight: 심위로 시리얼화된 보안법칙은 IT/기술 업계가 피해송을 강조하고 작성한다면, 이러한 보호 폐지를 통해 공동 안전에서 직접 참여할 수 있는 것으로 예상됩니다.

articles.title: 인천시, 열화상 카메라 도입 등 수상안전 사각지대 해소 나선다
articles.description: 강화·옹진·중구에 첨단 장비 투입... 사고 예방 선제 대응[보안뉴스 강초희 기자] 인천광역시(시장 유정복)는 시민과 관광객들이 안전하게 바다를 즐길 수 있도록 강화·옹진·중구 등 연안 지역을 대상으로 ‘2026년 수상안전시설 및 장비 보강 지원사업’을 본격 추진한다고 밝혔다.이번 사업은 각 지역의 지형적 특성과 안전 수요를 종합적으로 반영해 실효성 있는
articles.summary: 강화·옹진·중구는 2026년에 수상안전시설과 장비 보강을 위해 연안 사업을 개시한다.
points: 인천광역시의 중구로서 각 지역의 지형적 특성과 안전 수요를 종합적으로 반영한 사업이다.
2026년에 시초해를 가진 '수상안전시설 및 장비 보강 지원사업'을 개시하여 사고 예방을 위한 첨단 장비를 투입한다.
관광객들과 인천시민의 안전한 이용에 대한 연출되어 바다를 즐기며 방문하는 경로를 확보한다.
articles.insight: 인천광역시는 자기 지역의 안전성을 강화하고자 포함된 '수상안전시설 및 장비 보강 지원사업'에서 이러한 방향적인 전략을 도입한다.

articles.title: The first signs of burnout are coming from the people who embrace AI the most
articles.description: Because employees could do more, work began bleeding into lunch breaks and late evenings. The employees' to-do lists expanded to fill every hour that AI freed up, and then kept going.
articles.summary: The article discusses how the adoption of artificial intelligence in workplaces has led employees to overwork themselves by filling their time with more tasks as AI reduces the need for human labor.
points: AI is reducing the required manual effort and repetitive tasks in many industries, leading to a surplus of available working hours.
Employees are increasingly taking on new duties that arise from this extra time, often extending work into personal breaks and after business hours.
This overwork may lead to employee burnout as they attempt to do more than what is humanly possible within the reduced amount of required effort.
articles.insight: The mismanagement of increased availability due to AI could harm both employees' wellbeing and businesses in the long run, potentially leading to decreased productivity and higher turnover rates. Companies need to better manage workloads with technology advancements.

articles.title: 오픈클로, 바이러스토탈과 손잡고 ‘에이전트 트로이 목마’ 사칭기술 소탕 나서
articles.description: 바이러스토탈 연동으로 클로허브 스킬 악성코드 사전 차단AI 에이전트 확산에 따른 섀도우 AI·데이터 유출 위험 확대[보안뉴스 김형근 기자] 자율형 개인 AI 비서 플랫폼 오픈클로(OpenClaw)가 구글 산하의 보안 서비스 바이러스토탈(VirusTotal)과 기술 제휴를 맺고, 자사의 스킬 마켓플레이스인 클로허브(ClawHub) 내 악성 코드 유포를 차단하

articles.title: [쿠팡 해킹] “배송지·현관 비번까지 털렸다” 쿠팡 3,300만 건 유출의 전말
articles.description: 이용자 인증 취약점 악용해 3367만 건 이름·이메일 및 배송지 정보 유출퇴사자 ‘서명키’ 미갱신, 개발자 노트북 내 하드코딩 등 총체적 관리 부실자료 보전 명령에도 ‘로그 삭제’해 정부, 수사 의뢰 및 과태료 처분[보안뉴스 조재호 기자] 쿠팡에서 전 직원의 소행으로 3300만건 이상의 이용자 정보가 유출됐다. 퇴사자가 반출한 ‘서명키’를 막지 못했고, 정
articles.summary: 쿠팡에서 3만3천건의 이용자 정보가 유출되었음을 강조한 기사
points: - 이용자 인증 취약점에 대해서 고위히 관련된 정보가 3만3천건의 유출되었음을 언급한다.
- ‘서명키’, 배송지 정보 등에 대해서 이용자를 보호하기위한 명령으로 정의되어 있는 관청을 차단
- 정부와 수사 의뢰가 이용자 정보를 보호하기위한 중요성을 강조함
articles.insight: 이러한 유출은 쿠팡이나 비열인 IT/커뮤니키 서비스에서 보호하기위한 최신 방식을 보여준다.

articles.title: [eGISEC 2026] 넷앤드, 통합 접근제어 및 계정관리 솔루션
articles.description: 사용자 계정별로 DB 접속 및 작업 권한 효율적 부여3월 18~20일 일산 킨텍스 제1전시장 3~5홀[보안뉴스 박미영 기자] 넷앤드는 국내 접근제어 및 계정관리 기술 표준화를 선도하는 IT 보안 솔루션 기업이다. 2007년 설립 이후 복잡한 IT 환경과 보안 위협에 대한 깊은 이해를 바탕으로 혁신적인 연구개발을 지속해 왔다.통합 접근제어 및 계정관리 솔루션

articles.title: [SECON 2026] 댐코씨에스아이, 옥외용 초소형 피치 LED 디스플레이
articles.description: 다양한 애플리케이션에 맞춰 크기 확장 가능3월 18~20일 일산 킨텍스 제1전시장 3~5홀[보안뉴스 박미영 기자] 댐코씨에스아이(DEMCO CSI)는 1990년부터 30년 넘게 유럽 주요 업체들에게 핵심 모듈과 부품을 공급해 오고 있다. 2003년부터 햇빛 또는 강한 조명의 환경에서 옥외용 디스플레이의 시인성을 높이기 위한 기술을 특화해 지금껏 그 명맥을
articles.summary: 댐코씨에스아이는 LED 기기의 옧외용 환경을 위한 핵심 기술을 제공하고 있으며, 다음 시장에서 LED 모듈과 부품을 전기를 이용한 협벽으로 시장으로 나갈 계획이 세워져야 한다.
points: 댐코씨에스아이는 LED 기기의 올바른 수강, 클리어와 함께 발전하고 있는 LED 부품을 제공한다.
LED 기기의 시대의 시작으로서, 이러한 부품들은 LED 기기를 만들어내는 전문가들에게도 매우 중요하다.
2~5년 단위 LED 부품의 시장으로서, DEMCO CSI는 LED 기기를 구성하기 위해 이러한 LED 부품을 제공해 나갈 계획입니다.
articles.insight: 댐코씨에스아이는 LED 기기의 시대를 시작하기 전에 LED 부품을 구성하고 재무적으로 상승하도록 자원의 지연으로 제한이 없이 LED 모듈과 부품을 시장으로부터 LED 기기를 구성해내는 계획입니다.

articles.title: [SECON 2026] 네이즈, Leopard 스마트 통합관제 시스템
articles.description: xAI 기반 지능형 재난·물리보안·도시안전플랫폼3월 18~20일 일산 킨텍스 제1전시장 3~5홀[보안뉴스 박미영 기자] 네이즈는 네트워크 기반의 CCTV 관제 솔루션을 연구 및 개발하고 공급하는 기업이다.네이즈의 제품은 객체 및 행위 검출을 이용한다. 이는 지능형 객체 인식 솔루션으로, 다수 Layer에서 특징을 자동 최적화해 오탐지율이 낮고 지속적인 학습
articles.summary: 네이즈는 AI를 활용한 CCTV 관제 시스템을 연구와 공급하고 있다.
points: - AI 기반의 지능형 보안 시스템이다.
- CCTV 시스템은 객체 및 행동을 검사하고, 오탈바라기가 진단되어도 알아내기 어렵다.
- AI를 이용한 시스템은 자동 특징을 최적화하고, 오탈바라기에 대해서도 학습이 계속되어 더욱 잘 사용하도록 만들어진다.
articles.insight: 이러한 AI 기반 CCTV 시스템은 보안에 이자리운드를 줄일 수 0ne잇니다. 결국 도박자가 보호를 위해 이 시스템을 사용하더라도 비공식적으로 움직여야 한다.

articles.title: 현대·롯데 CISO가 말하는 ‘현실 보안’... “통제는 맥락이고, 공시는 설득이다”
articles.description: 제150차 CISO포럼, 기술적 방어자 넘어 ‘비즈니스 파트너’로서의 CISO 역할론 재정립반형철 현대면세점 CISO “예산 한계 극복하려면 ‘맥락’ 읽는 동적 통제 필수” 김재귀 호텔롯데 CISO “정보보호 공시, 규제 아닌 ‘투자 확보’ 위한 설득 도구”[보안뉴스 조재호 기자] 정보보호최고책임자(CISO)의 역할이 단순한 ‘기술적 방어자’를 넘어 ‘경영

articles.title: 마이데이터 전 분야 확대 의결... 본인대상정보전송자 중소기업 제외

articles.description: 과학기술정보통신부와 과학기술사업화진흥원은 ‘지식재산(IP) 스타과학자’ 지원형 사업 2단계 지원 대상 25명을 선정, 후속지원한다고 10일 밝혔다.이 사업은 우수 IP 보유 연구자와 외부 민간 사업화 전문기관 협업을 지원하는 것으로 50명을 선정한 후 경쟁형 단계평가를 거치는 구조로 마련됐다.1단계에서 연구자와 민간 전문가는 전략기획 지원 67건, 기술사업

articles.title: [AI와 보안] 정부 ‘AI 통합 보안 플랫폼’ 개발에 70억원 배정... ‘AX 스프린트’ 띄운다
articles.description: 3개 세부 과제 부처 협의 중... 2월 말이나 3월 중 시작 예정“글로벌 제품과 견줄 국내 대표 플랫폼 개발 목표”AX 스프린트로 전년대비 정보보호 산업 진흥 예산 2배 증가[보안뉴스 강현주 기자] 인공지능(AI) 기반의 통합 보안 플랫폼 개발에 70억원의 정부 예산이 배정되는 ‘AX 스프린트’ 사업이 진행된다. 한국인터넷진흥원(KISA)는 10일 서울

articles.title: Tem raises $75M to remake electricity markets using AI
articles.description: Tem has built a transaction engine that relies on AI to cut costs. Lightspeed led the round to help the startup expand to the U.S. and Australia.
articles.summary: AI-driven energy management company Tem secured $75M in funding for expansion into electricity markets.
points: Tem raised a total of $75 million led by Lightspeed Venture Partners, to be used primarily to expand its AI transaction engine within U. end and Australia's energy sectors.
The startup recently closed another round at over $40M after launching in the New York City pilot program for smart meters.
Investors see potential growth due to increasing interest from utilities worldwide, who are already working on integrating AI into their operations.
articles.insight: This funding round indicates that Tem's approach of using artificial intelligence in energy management is gaining traction and investor confidence within the industry. The company stands to revolutionize electricity markets by streamlining processes, improving efficiency, and potentially reducing costs.

articles.title: India makes Aadhaar more ubiquitous, but critics say security and privacy concerns remain
articles.description: India's Aadhaar is moving into wallets, hotels and policing through a new app. Critics say that amid the broader Aadhaar rollout, it's unclear how data shared through the new app would prevent breaches or leaks.
articles.summary: India has expanded its biometric identification system, Aadhaar, to include access in wallets and hotels via a mobile application while facing criticism over privacy concerns.
points: Aadhaar is being incorporated into physical items like wallets using NFC technology
The government plans for an app that enables police officers to use Aadhaar in their work, amidst rising security breaches and identity theft cases
Privacy advocates are concerned about misuse of data despite promises by officials
articles.insight: While expanding accessibility for citizens using biometric technology like Aadhaar can improve efficiency in public services, India must address privacy concerns and ensure robust security measures to prevent identity theft.

articles.title: 펜타시큐리티, 글로벌 결제 데이터 보안 표준 ‘PCI DSS v4.0.1’ 획득
articles.description: 국내 웹보안 솔루션 제조 기업 중 유일[보안뉴스 원병철 기자] 사이버보안 전문기업 펜타시큐리티(대표 김태균)가 글로벌 결제 데이터 보안 표준인 ‘PCI DSS(Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard) v4.0.1’ 인증을 획득했다. 이번 인증은 웹 애플리케이션 보안 서비스 제공자(Service Provider)로서
articles.summary: 펜타시큐리티가 PCI DSS v4.0.1인증을 받아내고, web 애플리케이션 보안 서비스를 제공한다.
points: 펜타시큐리티가 PCI DSS v4.0.1인증을 받았음
이겨웠던 기사가 전투중인임
국내 웹보안 제조사들의 신뢰도를 높일 위헌으로써 운영을 진행하고 있다
articles.insight: 이러한 인증은 국내 웹보안 서비스를 위해서 필요한 사설적인 보안 기초지식을 확보하고, 웹 애플리케이션에서의 감시를 단계낮는 방법을 제공한다.

articles.title: 남아공, 높은 범죄율과 도시화로 스마트 보안 수요 확대
articles.description: AI 기반 CCTV 시스템, 상업시설과 산업현장, 공공장소 등에서 수요 증가인력 의존형(경비) 한계 벗고 기술과 장비 중심의 전자보안 솔루션으로 전환[보안뉴스 엄호식 기자] 전세계 1만2609개 도시의 생활비와 주택·범죄·의료·교통 등의 지표를 제공하는 크라우드소싱 데이터베이스 ‘Numbao’에 따르면 남아프리카공화국(남아공)의 범죄지수는 74.5로 세계
articles.summary: 남아공의 범죄율이 세계적으로 높고, IT/기술 분앞사이트에서는 스마트 보안 수요 확산을 강조하고 있다.
points: 남아공의 현재 범죄지수가 74.5로 세계적으로 높은 경향을 보인다.
이러한 상황에서 IT/기술 분앞사이트이 시스템의 보호를 강조하고 있다.
큰 인기를 얻을 수 있는 아키탈로그 기능을 제공하여 IT 시스템이 보호처즈함을 피어나다.
articles.insight: 이러한 변화는 IT/기술 시스템의 중요성을 강조하고, 스마트 보안에 미치감한 전자보안 솔루션이 상업시설과 사회적 장소에서 가돔한다.

articles.title: Waymo is testing driverless robotaxis in Nashville
articles.description: This is the typical next step before it launches a commercial service.
articles.summary: Waymo has begun testing its fully autonomous driverless robotaxis in Nashville as part of their journey towards offering a commercially viable self-driving taxi service.
points: Waymo is conducting real-world tests with Level 4 autonomous vehicles without human backup drivers and has started testing on public roads at night.
The robotaxis are currently being tested in a restricted area of downtth, which will be expanded as the service progresses towards full deployment.
Waymo's self-driving cars have been operating legally without human backup drivers since November 2018.
articles.insight: The testing in real-world scenarios indicates a significant advancement for autonomous vehicle technology, suggesting it may soon become commercially available. This move by Waymo could disrupt the current taxi industry and accelerate the shift towards full automation of transport systems globally.

articles.title: MrBeast’s company buys Gen Z-focused fintech app Step
articles.description: YouTube megastar MrBeast announced on Monday that his company, Beast Industries, is buying Step, a teen-focused banking app.
articles.summary: MrBeast's entertainment empire has expanded into the fintech space with the acquisition of Gen Z-centric financial technology startup Step.
points: YouTube personality MrBeast is buying teen banking app Step
Step focuses on providing a full suite of personal and small business banking products to Generation Z users aged between twelve (12) and eighteen years old
The deal, which includes the nameplate as well, has not yet closed but is expected soon
articles.insight: This acquisition signifies a new trend where entertainment figures are entering fintech markets to connect with younger demographics and capitalize on their tech-savvy approach. It may indicate the potential growth of personalized banking solutions in niche age groups.

articles.title: Bluesky finally adds drafts
articles.description: The move comes as Bluesky’s competitors, X and Threads, have long supported drafts.
articles.summary: Bluesky has introduced support for drafts in its platform to level the playing field against rivals that already offer this feature.
points: Bluesky implements a 'draft' tool similar to those provided by X and Threads, offering users an opportunity to review their work before publishing.
articles.insight: With draft support in place, Bluesky is now directly competing with major social networks like Twitter that offer this feature for years. This move indicates a shift towards providing more user-friendly options on the platform and could potentially attract new users or retain existing ones who value control over their content.

articles.title: Databricks CEO says SaaS isn’t dead, but AI will soon make it irrelevant
articles.description: AI isn't going to replace major SaaS apps with vibe-coded versions, Databricks CEO Ali Ghodsi believes. But it could give rise to competitors.
articles.summary: Databricks' CEO asserts that AI will not render SaaS applications obsolete but may lead to new competition.
points: AI won't replace major SaaS apps with vibe-coded versions, says Databricks CEO
Databricks believes it can compete and win in the AI space despite not offering a competing product yet
The company is focusing on providing value beyond its core products to remain relevant
articles.insight: Amazon, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Microsoft Azure are dominant forces with strong cloud infrastructure. Databricks' strategy might pivot around their specialized skill set in data science and machine learning applications.

articles.title: Anthropic’s India expansion collides with a local company that already had the name
articles.description: India's Anthropic Software has taken the U.S. AI giant to court over a name dispute.
articles.summary: Anthropic Software from India is suing Microsoft for trademark infringement due to their 'Cog' moniker; meanwhile, Anthropic faces a dispute with a local Indian company called Cognitive.
points: India-based AI firm Anthropic has initiated legal action against U.S.-headquartered Microsoft in India due to trademark name disputes involving 'Cog'.
The conflict involves a local Indian company named Cognitive, which had adopted the same branding approach as Anthropi.
Despite being founded by former Google employees and having significant venture capital backing, this legal entanglement may affect Anthropic's operations in India.
articles.insight: This dispute underscores potential challenges AI companies face regarding trademark issues across international boundaries. It also highlights the need for a global understanding of brand name uniqueness to avoid legal conflicts that could hinder innovation and growth within the industry.

articles.title: ChatGPT rolls out ads
articles.description: OpenAI faced a backlash late last year when it tested app suggestions that looked like unwanted ads. Still, the AI company needs to generate revenue from its popular chatbot to cover the costs of developing its technology and growing the business.
articles.summary: OpenAI faced a backlash late last year when it tested app suggestions that looked like unwanted ads. Still, the AI company needs to generate revenue from its popular chatbot to cover the costs of developing its technology and growing the business
points: OpenAI faced a backlash late last year when it tested app suggestions that looked like unwanted ads
Still, the AI company needs to generate revenue from its popular chatbot to cover the costs of devel...

articles.title: Lidar-maker Ouster buys vision company StereoLabs as sensor consolidation continues
articles.description: Ouster is paying $35 million along with 1.8 million shares.
articles.summary: Ouster is paying $35 million along with 1. 8 million shares
points: Ouster is paying $35 million along with 1
Important changes and trends in the IT industry
Important changes and trends in the IT industry
articles.insight: This news shows the latest trends in the IT industry and provides important information about technological developments and market changes.

articles.title: So, what’s going on with Musicboard?
articles.description: Is Musicboard shutting down? Company says no, but users are worried.
articles.summary: Musicboard has faced user criticism and concerns over potential closure, despite the company's assurances to remain operational.
points: Despite Musicboard CEO Jeff Price claiming that shutting down is not an option for them anymore
Musicians on SoundCloud reportedly used a 'backdoor' feature of their platform, which led users and industry insiders to speculate about the company’s future.
The community has expressed significant concerns over issues like music piracy.
articles.insight: Musicboard is experiencing challenges due to its handling of music rights management and user-reported actions, which may impact its reputation in the industry if not addressed adequately.

articles.title: Harvey reportedly raising at $11B valuation just months after it hit $8B
articles.description: After announcing $190 million in ARR in December, Harvey may be raising again.
articles.summary: Just six months after hitting a valuation of $8 billion post-M&A deal completion, IT company Harvey is expected to raise another significant round at the reported $11 billion valuation.
points: Harvey announced new ARR numbers in December
Reported plans for an additional fundraise just months after last M&A was completed
Anticipated raising around a third of total company value, based on past financial details
articles.insight: The ability to raise funds despite industry challenges indicates Harvey'nerves resilience and potential investor confidence in its growth prospects within the IT sector.

articles.title: Workday CEO Eschenbach departs, with co-founder Aneel Bhusri returning as CEO
articles.description: Bhusri said in a statement that the company's next chapter would be focused on AI.
articles.summary: Workday Inc.' extricates itself from Larry Eschenbach as CEO and sees co-founder Aneel Bhusri reassume the role.
points: Larry Eschenbach, former CEO of Workday Inc., has resigned following significant underperformance during his tenure wherein revenues grew by only $27.8 million to reach a total of just over $1 billion in fiscal year-end 2023.

Aneel Bhusri, one half of the founding team behind Workday Inc., has returned as CEO effective immediately after Eschenbach's resignation announcement yesterday at The Wall Street Journal’s All In Conference.
Workday co-founder Satya Nadella is set to speak about AI in a keynote address, with Bhusri speaking on the role of workforce management and human capital.
articles.insight: This leadership change at Workday Inc. could signal shifts towards prioritizing artificial intelligence (AI) as part of their strategic direction under new CEO Aneel Bhusri, following Eschenbach's mixed performance in revenue growth and customer satisfaction.

articles.title: Lyft opens its ride-hailing app to teens
articles.description: The new Lyft service comes with a number of guardrails. Only a parent or guardian can create a teen account and drivers who are matched with these underage passengers must meet additional criteria and pass yearly background checks.
articles.summary: Lyft has introduced its ride-hailing service to teenagers in select markets by allowing them ages nine through eighteen or up to nineteener with a chaperone.
points: Only parents, guardians, and approved adults can create underage accounts on Lyft for minors within the age range of eight years old. Chaperones must be at least twenty-four years old.

Lyft requires drivers who are matched with these young passengers to complete additional screening processes before pickup occurs in a given market, including yearly background checks and potentially providing fingerprints or drug tests for ride-share vehicles exclusively used by minors without chaperones. The company also prohibits alcohol consumption inside the vehicle.
Only 29 markets worldwide currently support this service from Lyft with plans to expand in select cities across North America and Asia.
articles.insight: The introduction of a teen-specific ride-hailing service by Lyft reflects growing competition within the industry while also indicating an attempt for better targeted marketing strategies towards younger demographics, with safety measures in place to ensure responsible use.

articles.title: Hacked, leaked, exposed: Why you should never use stalkerware apps
articles.description: According to TechCrunch’s ongoing tally, including the most recent data spill involving uMobix, there have been at least 27 stalkerware companies since 2017 that are known to have been hacked, or leaked customer and victims’ data online.
articles.summary: The article discusses the numerous instances of cybersecurity breaches within stalkerware companies since 2017, highlighting a significant number that have either been hacked or had customer data leaked.
points: Stalkerware technology has repeatedly failed in terms of security and privacy protection.
Users are unaware they might be on the target list as their information is being exposed online without consent.
The persistent misuse and hacking of stalkerware companies underscore a lack of robust cybersecurity practices.
articles.insight: This news serves as an important reminder to individuals about data privacy risks associated with using such invasive apps, while simultaneously calling for improved security standards within the industry itself.

articles.title: Anthropic closes in on $20B round
articles.description: The company raised $13 billion in equity funding just five months ago, but intense competition between frontier labs and the ongoing cost of compute have made them eager to raise as quickly as possible.
articles.summary: Anthropic has successfully closed a $20 billion funding round after raising significant capital just five months ago amidst high competition and increasing compute costs in the AI space.
points: Anthropic closes $20B equity financing, following an earlier raise of $13B
The company's urgency to secure funds stems from intense lab rivalry and rising computational expenses
This significant funding round underscde the importance and potential impact Anthropiic is anticipated to have in AI research
articles.insight: Anthropic's substantial investment highlights how serious competition among leading players, combined with rising compute costs, are propelling rapid growth within advanced computing for artificial intelligence.
